Login.title: Sign In
Login.success: Welcome! You are now logged in

1.title: Account Type (Personal/Organization)
1.description: Create your account. Select 'Personal' if signing up individually and 'Organization' if registering for a business.

2.title: Complete Your Profile
2.description: Fill in all the necessary information to complete your account setup and unlock full access.

3.title: Post Job Ads
3.description: Provide job details, requirements, and qualifications to attract suitable candidates.

4.title: View Applicants
4.description: Review the list of applicants for the job, along with their profiles and submitted resumes.

5.title: Hire Employees
5.description: Select and confirm the candidate you want to hire for the position.
